title: Code Layout Standards
description: Defines module structure, import organization, and file header requirements.

rules.rationale: Standardizes file identification for automated filesystem tools and knowledge graph builders.
rules.statement: Every module under 'src/' MUST begin with a file path comment, module docstring, and future import.

rules.rationale: Clear separation of external vs internal dependencies simplifies environment debugging.
rules.statement: Imports MUST be grouped: future, stdlib, third-party, and finally internal modules.

rules.rationale: Establishes a single authoritative source for dependency management to prevent architectural drift.
rules.statement: Dependency Injection rules are defined canonically in 'dependency_injection.json'.
